alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:53PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 430 PM MST... At 353 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Mesa, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Visibility below 3 miles in blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, East Mesa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, San Tan Village Mall, Freestone Park, Canyon Lake, Fiesta Mall and Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 176 and 199. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 164 and 190, and near mile marker 194. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 9 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
